alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:34PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana and west central Adams Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monterey, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deer Park around 455 PM CDT. Natchez and Vidalia around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
